BIO

I'm originally from China and have been living in NZ for over five years. I consider NZ as my second home and love this country a lot. After found my passion on technology, I started my study with NZ's only fully immersive web development bootcamp programme(EDA). I believe in solving complex problems by approaching them head on and I have always had a drive for learning and investing my personal growth. In my spare time, I like reading, hiking, fully immersing myself into nature.
